Package index

All functions

compare_groups()
Compare microCT data between two genotypes or treatments
create_genotype_comparison() create_treatment_comparison()
Create a project skeleton to compare bone microCT data
create_organized_excel()
Write organized data to an Excel file
excel_export_addin()
Convert a raw data Excel file to an organized Excel file
knit_with_colored_text()
Render an R Markdown document with colored text
mctr_ex()
Get path to microCTr examples
plot_groups()
Plot bone microCT data by genotype or treatment
print_data()
Print bone microCT data
print_plots()
Print a list of plots
print_results()
Print bone mciroCT comparison analysis results
read_cortical_csv() read_cortical_excel()
Read in cortical bone data
read_key_csv() read_key_excel()
Read in a sample definition key file
read_mfe_csv() read_mfe_excel()
Read in finite element analysis data
read_trabecular_csv() read_trabecular_excel()
Read in trabecular bone data
update_microCTr()
Update microCTr
